alert.note: Alert for Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Walworth County through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Elkhorn, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elkhorn, La Grange, Abells Corners, Tibbets, and Millard. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 320 and 321. Interstate 43 between mile markers 27 and 28. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
